title: 快乐数 (Happy Number)
content: 思路:可以使用快慢指针 // @Title: 快乐数 (Happy Number) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-12 20:16:57 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 39.8 MB // @comment: 可以使用快慢指针 // @flag: WHITE class Solution { public boolean isHappy(int n) { int slow=n,fast=n; do{ slow=step(slow); fast=step(fast); fast=step(fast); }while(slow!=fast); return slow==1; } private int step(int n){ int sum=0; while(n!=0){ sum=sum+(n%10)*(n%10); n=n/10; } return sum; } } 思路:递归 // @Title: 快乐数 (Happy Number) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-12 01:44:40 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 40 MB // @comment: 递归 // @flag: WHITE class Solution { HashSet<Integer> set=new HashSet<>(); public boolean isHappy(int n) { if(n==1){ return true; } if(set.contains(n)){ return false; }else{ set.add(n); } int sum=0; while(n!=0){ sum=sum+(n%10)*(n%10); n=n/10; } return isHappy(sum); } }
